quoteText: The Services use cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, clear GIFs, JavaScript, and local storage.
title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: The Brilliant Cookie Policy states, "The Services use cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, clear GIFs, JavaScript, and local storage."
